trans-unit.source: Specifies the current stage of a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] download operation.
trans-unit.target: Adja meg az aktuális szakasza egy [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] töltse le a műveletet.

trans-unit.source: DeploymentProgressState is passed by way of the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DownloadProgressChangedEventArgs.State%2A> member of <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs>, which is used by the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>, <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged>, and <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: DeploymentProgressState úton van átadva a <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DownloadProgressChangedEventArgs.State%2A>tagja <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs>, által használt a <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>, <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged>, és <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>események.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged> </xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged> </xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged> </xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs> </xref:System.Deployment.Application.DownloadProgressChangedEventArgs.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the members of this enumeration to determine what portion of the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] deployment has already been downloaded to the local machine.
trans-unit.target: Ez az enumerálás tagjai segítségével határozhatja meg, milyen része a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] telepítési már letöltötte a helyi számítógépre.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] is downloading the DLLs and data files that comprised the application.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]a dll-EK és az adatok fájlokat, amelyek az alkalmazás letöltése.
